column5: For those in the area, come see us at the show. It is located at the Radisson Convention Center! It starts this evening at 5PM Hope to see you there!

I was impressed with the turnout at the show. I was there with my daughter Sunday morning and figured (wrongly) it would be empty with the Packer game in the afternoon. It was nice to put a face with the name for you and a couple of other operators I wanted to meet.I haven't been to an All Canada show in about 15 years, it's good to see that it still draws a lot of fishermen and hunters. You can learn a lot with the internet these days but nothing beats a face to face conversation to get a feel for how good a fit a camp is.
You should have went in the afternoon.
It was pretty much a Ghost Show after noon or so.Friday and Saturday were both packed though!It is always great meeting fellow walleyecentral(ians)

Sunday afternoon at Pheasant Run was the same way due to the Green Bay game. They should look in to moving the date to maybe the weekend between the play offs and the Superbowl or after the Superbowl.
